org.activiti.crystalball.simulator

类 AbstractSimulationRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.activiti.crystalball.simulator.AbstractSimulationRun
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SimulationDebugger, SimulationRun
    直接已知子类:
    ReplaySimulationRun, SimpleSimulationRun

    public abstract class AbstractSimulationRun
extends Object
implements SimulationRun, SimulationDebugger
    This class implements all methods for Simulation run
    作者:
    martin.grofcik

      • execute

        public void execute(VariableScope execution)
             throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: SimulationRun
        executes simulation run according to configuration already set
        指定者:
        execute 在接口中 SimulationRun
        参数:
        execution - execution is variable scope used to transfer input/output variable from and to simulation run.
        抛出:
        Exception
